tool_description: Tiktok Best Spider. Fast. HD Quality. Without Watermark Download. Video Full Detail. Signature X-Argus,X-Ladon,X-Gorgon. Contact us(https://t.me/lyi005) for a small or large package.
name: Tiktok video no watermark
title: Tiktok video no watermark

api_list.name: Signature X-Argus & X-Ladon & X-Gorgon
api_list.description:
Signature X-Argus & X-Ladon & X-Gorgon & X-Khronos (Only Android)

Valid device information(**iid** & **device_id**) is required, with correct **aid** and **app_name**

Tiktok will only verify parameters, not endpoint addresses.

Full URL in parameter example

> https://api.tiktokv.com/aweme/v1/user/profile/other/?user_id=107955&os_api=25&device_type=A5010&manifest_version_code=250304&app_name=musical_ly&version_name=25.3.4&app_type=normal&channel=googleplay&update_version_code=250304&device_platform=android&build_number=25.3.4&version_code=250304&app_language=en&device_brand=OnePlus&os_version=7.1.2&aid=1233&iid=7127540981901510406&device_id=7127539617850918405

required_parameters.name: params
required_parameters.description:
params requires correct device information, with the corresponding **aid & app**_name

For example

```
aid=1180&app_name=trill
aid=1233&app_name=musical_ly
aid=1340&app_name=musically_go
```

optional_parameters.name: headers
optional_parameters.description:
Must be a correct json string
When sending a post request to the Tiktok server, there must be `x-ss-stub`

optional_parameters.name: device_token
optional_parameters.description:
The `device_token` obtained via the `Register Device Information` endpoint.

`AdL7JnVB2QL5UPtDjXhTzmN1w`

api_list.name: get tiktok video info
api_list.description:
Get tiktok video full info. HD Quality, No Watermark. Fast.
Support Tiktok & Douyin.
Support Getting Image List.
Support Tiktok Stories.

optional_parameters.name: hd
optional_parameters.description:
Get HD Video(High bit rate). This increases the total request time a little.
response:   data.hdplay

api_list.name: ttEncrypt
api_list.description:
ttEncrypt
With it, you can construct encrypted AppLog payload like device registration, device activation, etc.
The returned result is a hexadecimal string

api_list.name: decrypt get token
encrypt get token
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tiktok-video-no-watermark2.p.rapidapi.com/service/encryptGetToken"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tiktok-video-no-watermark2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tiktok-video-no-watermark2.p.rapidapi.com/service/encryptGetToken"

print(response.json())
